sec.title: Bentham Science Corporate Sales
sec.p: As one of the world’s major STM publishers, here at Bentham Science, we publish in excess of 100 highly respected online and print peer-reviewed journals. We also publish a fast growing collection of ebooks. Since 1993, we have been supporting the educational needs of the pharmaceutical, engineering, biomedical and medical research community.

sec.title: Create awareness of your Brand and reach your target audience
sec.p: Through a variety of print and electronic formats we can help you to deliver a marketing strategy for your brand.

list-item.p: Reprints & ePrints – Highlight your brand with an article or chapter reprint in either print or electronic format and lend kudos with publication branding.
Themed Collections – Reinforce your message with a collection of articles in branded livery.
Supplements – Build Brand awareness, deliver cutting edge information, and support educational needs, with a peer reviewed supplement circulated with one of our highly regarded journals.
Newsletters – Deliver your important message quickly with one of our subject specific “Key Views” newsletters, delivered direct to your target audience, via one or more of our peer reviewed journals.
Sponsored subscriptions – Increase visibility by providing valuable clinical content to your target audience.
Books – A range of options including bulk orders, ePrints and translations.
Custom publications – Help build relationships with bespoke branded publications.
Advertising – Build brand awareness with targeted flexible print or online advertising options.
Translations - Extend the reach of your product, service or brand, we can offer you a comprehensive translation service.
Webinars and Podcasts – Sponsored webinars and Podcasts allow in depth engagement with experts and key opinion leaders globally.
Endorsements from Nobel Laureates and Eminent Scientists
Excellent customer service and efficient project management
